channel.title: Docs on HugoModo
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on HugoModo

item.title: Shortcodes
item.description: Hugo All of the standard Hugo shortcodes work with HugoModo by default. Those listed below also work with the shims provided by the Shortcode Partials extension. figure Markup {{< figure src="/img/mountaineer.jpg" title="A walk with a view." >}} Example A walk with a view. gist Markup {{< gist spf13 7896402 >}} Example highlight Markup {{< highlight go-html-template >}} <section id="main"> <div> <h1 id="title">{{ .Title }}</h1> {{ range .
